column1: Kata Robata////The atmosphere here is nice; it's dimly lit and clean. It's kind of trendy and can be considered overpriced
column2: so it's def a spot to treat yourself. Â Some of their items are hit or miss. A miss would be their Japanese sausage. But that would be my bad
column3: since I expected more than what it actually is. It is literally grilled sausage.
